website_summaries.verdict: A nice medium-sized microwave with a number of useful features.
pros: Heats well and easy to operate
Pre-set buttons for easy cooking on commonly used items
cons: Does not have a moisture release gauge for food reheating

customer_reviews.title: Brand New to Complete Trash in 6 months!!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this microwave in April 2015 and it has stopped working (Sept 15 2015). I have never experienced a microwave dying on me in less than 10yrs... I was very disappointed that this only lasted 6 months! I used it lightly only to reheat meals... Just a sad sad product...
customer_reviews.author: Chris Daniels

customer_reviews.title: Very nice microwave. I just wished when the time went ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice microwave. I just wished when the time went off it would beep only once or twice and stop, but it continues on. If you open the door before timer is done the remaining time still shows on the display. My previous microwave cleared the time when open. This one you need to press the reset button. Just for information. My previous one lasted 16 years.
customer_reviews.author: R and E

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this.  And the buttons are logical!
customer_reviews.text: Does what it's supposed to do, but I gave it 5 stars because other microwaves have a dumb way of setting the time to cook - you want 20 seconds so you press the two and it abruptly sets itself to 2 minutes and immediately starts! So you have to press Time and then 20 and then start. This works more instinctively. You start typing in the time you want and then hit start. Don't know why that's so hard to find these days.
customer_reviews.author: Christian

customer_reviews.title: Defective product
customer_reviews.text: Not happy. I just got the item a couple days ago. It worked great the first couple of times we used it. Now today, it won't heat up anything. Not even a cinnamon roll. I'm really disappointed that I already have to exchange the product or spend more time picking out another one. Very upset.
customer_reviews.author: marangwat

customer_reviews.title: but works great. I like that you can set the seconds
customer_reviews.text: A little noisy to close, but works great. I like that you can set the seconds. Others you have to set minutes then have to watch it so it doesn't overcook or boil over. The price was good too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not packaged complete
customer_reviews.text: The microwave works but My microwave came without the turntable ring thing. I have tried calling the number in the back of the user manual to get it everytime I get someone that says they will ship it right out to me....I should see it in 2-4 weeks, so I wait then call back....over and over, repeatedly waiting and calling, finally this time they gave me a supervisors phone number, but of course I got the voicemail;.
customer_reviews.author: Madison Resource Funding

customer_reviews.title: Not a long lasting item
customer_reviews.text: I guess we got what we paid for although $100 isn’t on the lowest scale of microwaves I priced out. Bought this for my parents June 2017 and at one point the door would get stuck, which we were able to fix but little by little I noticed “bubbling” to the ceiling of the microwave through the time. Came to my parents and thought it was a dirty microwave when in reality it’s all rusted and falling apart! How is this possible after two years?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works fine, but I'm not please with how it looks ...
customer_reviews.text: I've only owned this for about 3 months and the plastic over the numbers is starting to bubble/wrinkle. It works fine, but I'm not pleased with how it looks old and poorly cared for after such a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works fine although for some reason it has popped my breaker ...
customer_reviews.text: Works fine although for some reason it has popped my breaker once since purchase even though it is 250 watts lower power than the one it replaced. But more room. Not getting five stars because the control panel isn't particularly well laid out and there does not appear to be any instant 30 second button and the start button isn't obvious as it is grey, so I've programmed it a few times and then hit clear or something else rather than start.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McElhineyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Wanted something a little simpler to use
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something very easy for my senior aunt who lives alone to use safely. Very difficult to find microwaves that have basic easy to see and understand controls. This is working ok but not as user friendly as I had hoped. Just barely fits in small space we have.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Microwave have become almost disposablel
customer_reviews.text: My new Westinghouse microwave cost less than one third the price of my former microwave yet outperforms it. The temperature is correct and it operates simply and quickly.
customer_reviews.author: retired female attorney

customer_reviews.title: Not a good microwave
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!!! Impossible to heat up anything. Cannot set power settings without a doctorate degree. I return mine for the Farberware professional
customer_reviews.author: Ashland A.

customer_reviews.title: Lasted a week then died.  It doesn't even take the chill off of anything.  I heated a cup of water for over 5 min and still cold
customer_reviews.text: I've never had this happen before. Worked great for a week, now won't heat at all.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Meads

customer_reviews.title: It is just ok
customer_reviews.text: It is just ok. Not great, buy a better one.
customer_reviews.author: D T

customer_reviews.title: A great medium-sized microwave
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this microwave for several months now. It is very reliable, easy to use and fits nicely on my counter.
customer_reviews.author: rob

customer_reviews.title: Door quit opening after 8 months!
customer_reviews.text: 8 months later door quit opening...have to hit button with one hand and pull door open with other. Get one with a warranty!
customer_reviews.author: FrontLineTrainer

customer_reviews.title: Died after 7 months of use.
customer_reviews.text: Very unhappy with purchase. Died today after only 7 months. I've had microwaves last 15 years before. How can a modern manufacturer produce something that has such a short lifespan? DO NOT BUY.
customer_reviews.author: Happy wife

customer_reviews.title: This Westinghouse Microwave seems like a great buy
customer_reviews.text: This Westinghouse Microwave seems like a great buy, so far. It cooks evenly and quickly. It's easy to use. It's a nice size and looks good on the counter. This microwave seems like a well made product. Works flawlessly for reheating coffee and meals. We use it several times a day. It replaced a more expensive microwave, which gave out after 3 years.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Nelson

customer_reviews.title: big and powerful
customer_reviews.text: Works almost too great I have to cut down cooking times because its so powerful. Also the fact it doesnt have an "add 30 seconds" button is pretty annoying but dont really need it since its so powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Greg R.

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It didn't stop in the same place it started. Example: You put your cup of coffee in handle facing out , when it stopped, the cup handle could be facing any direction. never facing out so you could pick it up easily. Very inconvenient.
customer_reviews.author: West coast Mike

customer_reviews.title: Beware!!
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for two weeks suddenly light stays on and the microwave no longer cooks. Do not buy this one junk!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Bates

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I've only been using it for about a month but so far, no complaints. It's a nice size, not too small & not too big. Heats up everything great. It was shipped to me right on time & in great condition!
customer_reviews.author: trinitee0925

customer_reviews.title: See me in two years.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Microwave 3 months ago and it is working. The real test is two years form now can I say the same.
customer_reviews.author: Louis Levy

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: Very "tinny' compared to my ancient KMC. Like comparing a Ford with a Mercedes. Having said that, it works fine and lives up to its 1000 watt output. I am satisfied and feel it is well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Stan Plested

customer_reviews.title: Poor customer service
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last a year, customer service said they would replace, but now will not return calls or answer questions! I would not recommend this brand to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Robert rush

customer_reviews.title: Numbers hard to read
customer_reviews.text: The numbers are hard to read. Can’t tell if it’s a time that hasn’t been cleared for the actual time sometimes. Cheap
customer_reviews.author: Janet Ann Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Rip off
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after less than a month. Would not refund or replace.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M. Kiefer

customer_reviews.title: Great microwave! Does everything I need it to do
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave! Does everything I need it to do. Very sharp and nice looking in my kitchen. I was happy to get a good price and am very satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: jewel

customer_reviews.title: Love that this one has a light on the inside ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that this one has a light on the inside that goes on when we open the door. Works fine. Have had no issues
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Serves the purpose but not the quality of other microwaves I have had.
customer_reviews.author: Sadonie Kirby

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in just over a year!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this just stopped working in a little over a year. I won't buy another of this brand!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works fine. Is a bit louder than my last one
customer_reviews.text: works fine. Is a bit louder than my last one, but it's about getting the food hot....it does so, no complaints there. :)
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Walton

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great microwave. I love the many features....popcorn setting, potato... Nice, big size. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Parrot Lover

customer_reviews.title: A really HOT Microwave...
customer_reviews.text: Works like a dream... A great value... simple to figure out and use... Just a great microwave oven. I highly recommend this unit.. a definite value.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Pendleton

customer_reviews.title: She is happy and has not mentioned any problems with it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter. She is happy and has not mentioned any problems with it. Recommend it
customer_reviews.author: TmSutt

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave. Loud beeps, but who cares? It's a microwave that is fast and reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Not quality!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last 90 days and can't return after 30 days. Don't wast your money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but works great. Very quiet
customer_reviews.text: A little more damaged than I thought ,but works great .Very quiet.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Mckirahan

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Door jams when hot, not enough to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Anthony Wells

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Popcorn button needed to be reset to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Popcorn button needed to be reset to 1:20. It is a good brand, so I expected it would work great.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Brand new and the door button is broken. Can’t open it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this model at all
customer_reviews.text: We don't really use our microwave for cooking. It is mostly used to warm food up. But we used our old one a lot for making popcorn. This microwave does not work well for popping corn. Only 25% of the kernels pop and if we run it longer it burns. Have tried the "Popcorn" button, high power, different corn poppers (glass, plastic etc) - all of which worked with our older model. ALso, it takes much longer to heat food up than our last few models did. I would not recommend this model at all. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: CheleT

customer_reviews.title: Love....
customer_reviews.text: Awesome microwave. Works great with easy to use face plate. Got it for my elderly mom and she can work it without any confusion. Super sturdy too!!️👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: tori west

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Its great bang for the buck. Good size and power. Perfect for my use which is minimal but it's strong enough for higher usage
customer_reviews.author: dennis Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is truly one of the best microwaves that I've ever owned! 😂 I'm completely satisfied with the performance. Heating, cooking, defrosting, etc. Most TV dinners recommend a microwave of at least 1100w, and this is a 1000w microwave, that has far exceeded my expectations. Why do companies even sell lower wattage ovens? They're useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: It wobbles! :(
customer_reviews.text: I never got the centering device with the roller wheels on it that keeps the glass tray level when it is rotating during cooking. The glass tray just wobbles! Why can't you just get it right people!
customer_reviews.author: Scott McAlister

customer_reviews.title: Nice Machine and FANTASTIC customer service
customer_reviews.text: I love the size in and out, the ease of using, the lighting, etc. A little over a month it up and died for no reason, too late to send back to Amazon; but I called the 1-800 number in the book's manufacture warranty section. They had me cut the cord off and as soon as they received the cord and the serial sticker back, they sent us a brand new replacement. We could not have asked for better customer service!!!
customer_reviews.author: Health nuttybuddy

customer_reviews.title: VERY Satisfied!  Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: It's wonderful! Very easy to use and made very well!
customer_reviews.author: Billy Dee

customer_reviews.title: I am disappointed with this purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed with this purchase. The oven works on regular power but the quick cook buttons don't work and the power buttons don't work so something that needs to be nuked at 50 percent power doesn't cook properly...even though I don't use those features on a regular basis, I would expect a new appliance to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Christine M. Dunbar

customer_reviews.title: Had this product since Dec., now 7 months ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this product since Dec. , now 7 months later it crapped out. I'm single so its not used that much. You decide now.
customer_reviews.author: jc carter

customer_reviews.title: nice product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome service, and the microwave is perfect size for counter top. Does not have a 30 second button.
customer_reviews.author: Lori gravel

customer_reviews.title: Trips the breakers all the time
customer_reviews.text: This microwave trips the breakers as soon as it's plugged in, even before any buttons get pushed. We've plugged it in lots of different places and buildings so it's definitely not a bad breaker. It's never worked right.
customer_reviews.author: duxlunaire

customer_reviews.title: POOR Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Had less than a year- used very lightly- Blew up! Don't waste your money-
customer_reviews.author: Brice Jackson @   B & J  Cattle Co.

customer_reviews.title: Is taller than specified. I bought it special so ...
customer_reviews.text: Is taller than specified. I bought it special so it would fit under a built in cabinet. Doesn't fit, send ing it back.
customer_reviews.author: Atonic

customer_reviews.title: started making horrible nose so got rid of it never bye one ...
customer_reviews.text: It has already done! started making horrible nose so got rid of it never bye one of those again
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: microwave
customer_reviews.text: Great microwave. only complaint we have is that the beeps are so loud and you can't turn them down or off. Other than that I highly recommend this microwave. On this one you press 6-0-START to set it for one minute or 1-0-0-START if you like to push buttons. The beverage button is 1:10 and very hot. You would press BEVERAGE-1 (for number of cups)-Start. The number of cups is kinda confusing at first but this microwave can heat up 2 or more cups really quick so its great once you get use to it! Same for potatoes and pizza. Its a great microwave and loud. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Schobester

customer_reviews.title: I guess for a hundred bucks it's okay--but the hinges on the door are badly made.
customer_reviews.text: The hinges on the door go out of line very easily. This has not been an abused appliance, not in any way at all. Still, after about 1.5 years, the button to the door would work only intermittently and now, after not even 4 years, the door hinge has failed. I guess this is what you get these days for a hundred bucks. Disappointed in Westinghouse, though. I expected more from them, to be honest.
customer_reviews.author: Doc

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: Works well and shipping was fast with Amazon Prime! This was purchased to replace a 15 year old microwave that died unexpectedly. As we are empty nesters, we wanted a smaller unit that wouldn't take up as much room on the counter. This one still takes up more space (and was a bit heavier) than I would have liked, but I did manage to reclaim some counter space!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Evans-Dean

customer_reviews.title: Looks great; works well
customer_reviews.text: Light enough for me to lift when needed; strong enough that my cats can jump from it to the top of the refrigerator (poor me). This is a good-looking microwave. It functions well, even for people like me who are bad with instructions. It's easy to clean. I use it more for popcorn, defrosting and microwave-only foods, so I can't report on actual cooking. Please read other reviews for that. If you're more of a casual user, like me, you'll be very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan R. Meyer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Received defective. Westinghouse confirmed 'defective.' Couldn't ''boil a mug of water!'
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: It's ok...I guess?
customer_reviews.text: Three weeks in and there's plastic on the buttons tearing off, and looks a bit tacky. Heats up food perfectly though no complaints there. If it wasn't for the wearing of the plastic on the buttons, 5 stars. It's a really great microwave for the price but you can see where the price comes in with the wear and tear.
customer_reviews.author: Simeon

customer_reviews.title: If you had a Sharp you loved, this is the perfect replacement.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for one similar to my old sharp. This is almost identical. Light comes on when you open the door, which is a feature most don't have. It has a push button for the door so it stays in place when you open the door. The only negative is that there is not a 30 second or a 1 minute button, but it does not take long to get used to entering the amount of time. We love it!
customer_reviews.author: davidroofer

customer_reviews.title: A well-made high performing countertop Microwave Oven at a fair price
customer_reviews.text: This countertop oven is compact, yet with a spacious interior. It has an intuitive and easy to read Control Panel. The turntable eliminates hot-spots and all foods prepared with it turned out great. Very pleased with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Kach22

customer_reviews.title: Great looking microwave
customer_reviews.text: Great looking microwave. Good size for a small apartment. Very effective at reheating and cooking smaller items like potatoes and popcorn. Wish they had a +30 seconds button or quick minute/ add time button. In order to add more time to whatever it is your microwaving you have to hit the reset button on the front then type in how much longer you want it to run for. Not super inconvenient, but just enough so that I've taken off a star.
customer_reviews.author: ElTee

customer_reviews.title: Long lasting and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this microwave in 2015 and still going strong. A very good one for the money and would buy another one again.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick L. Hicks

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. We can get small casserole dishes and tall, 20oz, tea cups in, so we're happy
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, power and price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size, power and price! Have been using for a couple of months and have no complaints. I use my microwave for re heating and baking prep/ This model is perfect for that. Yes, it does have a popcorn button that does a perfect job.
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Button positioning is a bit odd. Wish it had ...
customer_reviews.text: Button positioning is a bit odd. Wish it had instant hotkey minutes. So far though solid machine. I even briefly microwaved metal before I realized my mistake (chinese take out container with a metal handle) and it seems to have survived.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Andrew Becking

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace my old microwave that I had for years. It looks really good at first but after two months the plastic on the buttons have started to peel. It looks like someone took a knife and scrapped across the buttons and it lifted the plastic. Other than that it's okay. Edited 10/27/19: it’s still going strong. So I’ll give it another star.
customer_reviews.author: Chianta Gary

customer_reviews.title: don't buy this!
customer_reviews.text: did not even last a month before it won't heat/cook anything at all. Would never recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: BuddysMom

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Very displeased. Received this product yesterday, and while it turned on, the food would not heat, nor would the plate rotate. Contacted the manufacture and they said it was a defect, and that I would need to contact Amazon for a refund or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Honeycomb3

customer_reviews.title: Piece o' crap.
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine for about 5 uses, then went kaput. Piece o' crap. Maybe shipping hurt it? Who knows.
customer_reviews.author: Pamina

customer_reviews.title: Operates very well and I am very happy with the product
customer_reviews.text: Fit the tight location perfectly. Operates very well and I am very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: Not as powerful as expected but this was a replacement ...
customer_reviews.text: Not as powerful as expected but this was a replacement for employees at one of our work locations so does what we need it to.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Died after 16 months
customer_reviews.text: Was okay while it lasted but I expected more longevity from it.
customer_reviews.author: WPS

customer_reviews.title: Ver Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: It has all the settings you need. Looks great and works great.
customer_reviews.author: beverly  baker

customer_reviews.title: received quickly and is easy to use and almost identical to the one that ...
customer_reviews.text: received quickly and is easy to use and almost identical to the one that I had.. A few minor differences but am very happy and price was really good.
customer_reviews.author: Florene M. Welebny

customer_reviews.title: Two and a half months later and it has fried ...
customer_reviews.text: Two and a half months later and it has fried after maybe 20 uses. It no longer works and I have to now mess with the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Joe D

customer_reviews.title: It's also pretty noisy.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is ok, really nothing fancy though. Does not have a quick set button for a minute nor a button to add in increments of 30 seconds. It's also pretty noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle CustomerTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: iMac away is perfect it has everything It should do
customer_reviews.author: Delaine Irvin

customer_reviews.title: He has not complained so we are calling it good.
customer_reviews.text: Used by our son in his apartment while in college. He has not complained so we are calling it good.

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this microwave after our old microwave stopped working. It is working wonderfully so far, and looks great in our kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the kitchen at work. So far it has been doing the job
customer_reviews.author: PPRO

customer_reviews.title: Hoping for a better glass
customer_reviews.text: the turntable glass broke after having it 2 weeks Replacing it with the same product. Hoping for a better glass
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie M

customer_reviews.title: so we are happy.
customer_reviews.text: This microwave is smaller than other models and lower wattage but it is just what we need, so we are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hebert

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: A minor problem with turn table when first received but seems to have fixed itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. Works as advertised, and you don't need an advanced degree to read the instructions or operate it.

customer_reviews.title: it works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: It was just what I needed, it works like a charm.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: It stopped working in two months it's a piece of crap
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for an apartment. Bought it for my granddaughter and she lives it.
customer_reviews.author: Judy H

customer_reviews.title: Love it! so far!
customer_reviews.text: very happy with this one! hope it lasts more than a year! three prior ones were various makes and models but they all failed less than a year old! guess they just make junk anymore. hope this one is a good make and model. so far it works great just doesn't have a quick minute button that most of them do, yet the turning tray stays put, the last model had a tray that kept falling off it's peg. This one is very stable
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Received this from Amazon Warehouse deals so I wasn't expecting a perfect microwave, but I was expecting it to at least work. Tried heating up a cup of water for 3 minutes and it was still ice cold. Now I assumed it would come with some body damage but I figured the tray would evenly rotate. Oh, and the door wasn't well aligned and the hinge seems weak. Overall, I wish I had kept my 24 year-old Panasonic with a rusted inside instead of recycling it for earth day.
customer_reviews.author: K.C.

customer_reviews.title: Happy customers
customer_reviews.text: Only annoyance is that you cant stop the "finished cooking" beeping prematurely. You have to let it run its course or do what we do and stop it with a few seconds left then press reset. Otherwise its a strong microwave, not overly loud, easy to clean, large enough for a dinner plate, talk enough for any of our bowls. We're happy customers
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Glad I took a chance on warehouse deals
customer_reviews.text: What a Deal!!! I needed to replace immediately with a larger microwave and this fit the needs. 2 day shipping and low cost. Works great! Glad I took a chance on warehouse deals. I will do this more often!
customer_reviews.author: kim

customer_reviews.title: I purchased last week for $85, and now $109. Price point too high
customer_reviews.text: It's a basic microwave oven. I've found no significant decrease in cooking time. I came back to buy another and found 23% price increase.
customer_reviews.author: R. R. Garrett

customer_reviews.title: Great Deal
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend who was shocked at prices while shopping locally and he loved everything about this microwave. He also said how much better it fit the space. I told him that's why I love Amazon-best price-all specs and reviews to find out what's best!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even have a minutes plus setting!!! ...
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't even have a minutes plus setting!!! Wish I didn't keep it in the box as gift for a month now I can't return!! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Countertop 1.1 Cubic Feet Microwave Oven, 1000 Watt, Black Front with Black Cabinet, Commercial Chef CHCM11100B
product_meta.description: With the CHCM11100B microwave oven you’re getting 1000 watts of cooking power and a spacious 1.1 cubic foot interior. The easy-to-read LED display is equipped with both clock and timer options, making it easy to keep track of when your food will be ready. With 10 cooking power levels and 6 one-touch quick cook menu buttons you can prepare just about any food worry free. There is also an auto defrost option that executes to perfection just by entering the type of food and weight
feature_bullets: Kitchen countertop microwave oven that prepares snacks and heats up last night’s leftovers in minutes.
Sturdy construction with black front display and black cabinet finish for compact durability
Easy simple green LED display. Push button touch controls for quick use. Digital clock display and timer.
10 microwave power levels to deliver a quality meal every time.
